DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate bioequivalence 2 tablet SYR-472 25 milligram ( mg ) 1 tablet SYR-472 50 mg administer healthy adult male .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 , Bioequivalence Study SYR-472 25mg 50mg Tablets
DOC.detailed_description: Bioequivalence 2 SYR-472 25 mg tablet 1 SYR-472 50 mg tablet administer healthy adult male investigate randomized , open-label , crossover study .
